thread.title: Kailyn Lowry Pregnancy Rumors Are Getting Harder to Deny
thread.title_full: Kailyn Lowry Pregnancy Rumors Are Getting Harder to Deny

title: Kailyn Lowry Pregnancy Rumors Are Getting Harder to Deny
text:
Kailyn Lowry Pregnancy Rumors Are Getting Harder to Deny Nicole Pomarico 
kaillowry/Instagram 
Despite the fact that she's now officially divorced from Javi Marroquin Kailyn Lowry has been plagued by pregnancy rumors as of late, and it seems like they aren't going anywhere anytime soon. Supposedly Kailyn really is pregnant , if a source close to her is telling the truth. 
According to what the insider tells RadarOnline , Kail is already expecting her third child with the same guy she was allegedly hanging out with soon after she and Javi split. So far, the source doesn't have any other details, and suspiciously enough, Kailyn recently tweeted about learning from her mistakes, as Radar pointed out. I may not have always made the best choices but I will say today I'm happy & my heart is so full ðï¿½ï¿½¤ — Kail Lowry (@KailLowry) February 21, 2017 
Definitely cryptic, but does this mean she's pregnant? We're not sure. And since Kailyn and her rep have told Radar Online that she's not actually expecting, that's what we're going to have to go with for now. 
More From CafeMom: Kailyn Lowry Reveals She'd Consider Getting Back Together With Javi Marroquin 
It would be pretty surprising if she is pregnant, considering everything she has going on right now. She's a newly single mom of two, she's about to graduate college, and then there's a little thing called Teen Mom 2 . We'd say she definitely has her hands full! 
And honestly, whether or not Kail is pregnant, it's totally up to her when she chooses to share it -- although if the rumors are true, a baby bump is going to get harder and harder to hide as time goes on. 
Whatever happens, we can't wait to find out! One thing we can say for sure -- following the lives of our favorite Teen Mom 2 stars is never boring.
